title: PREPARE DEMANDS FOR PRODUCTION BACKUPS & ENVIRONMENT REFRESH FOR SECLI AND ATLAS ONLY (TEST_ENV)

task_list.instruction_title:
For SECLI and ATLAS only, refresh DB (+ QSAM files for ATLAS) + REQUIRED FILES on **TEST-ENV **from **PROD **
_- For RUN/DR: Backup BEFORE EOD/EOM with NEXT RUN date
- For CUTOVER: Backup / Restore AFTER EOD before migration weekend

**PROD ONLY**
_- **SECLI**: Backup and restore on Friday 14.11 morning at 6:00AM, after SECLI batch completed OK - - **RESTORE only DBSECLI database on EV4** (exclude all others: exabn, dbswift, ...)

- **ATLAS**: Backup and restore on Friday 14.11 morning at 6:00AM, after ATLAS batch completed OK
